entry.title: 个人笔记
entry.content: 生命在于折腾，又把博客折腾到Hexo了。给Hexo点赞。 初次使用hexo还不错长沙 代码实例` 用车申请 <meta charset="utf-8"> <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge"> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, user-scalable=no"> <link rel="stylesheet" href="../lib/weui.min.css"> <link rel="stylesheet" href="../css/jquery-weui.css"> <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/font-awesome/css/font-awesome.css"> <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/demos.css"> <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/apply.css"> `
